translations: 名誉不好地（disreputable 的副词形式）

sentences.sentence: Vernacular fiction was scorned as a disreputably popular form.
sentences.translation: 当时，作为一种文学创作形式，白话文小说一直受世人冷眼。

sentences.sentence: Some MPs worked the expenses system too disreputably to keep their seats or, in some cases, their ministerial jobs or places on the Conservative front bench.
sentences.translation: 一些操纵开支系统的议员们因够声名狼藉，或者在一些事情上，因他们的部门指责和地位在保守派议会前座才保住他们的位置。
